title: The Man Who Built the Castle
description: A play about two people who cross paths in a boring town and find themselves connected by their love of art." I agree. Honestly, I am lonely in general, For me, I'm not looking for love, I am looking for someone that can share profound realizations with me. Someone that understands art and life. Someone that appreciates me""I'm not saying he was supernatural, I am saying he was an artist. Artists that put their work out to the world in whatever form can not be called normal. They are superior beings because they create something beautiful out of something average."
author: M. Wellman
